question: Pentala Harikrishna registered his first win at _____________.
explanation: Indian Grandmaster Pentala Harikrishna registered his first win at the Moscow FIDE Grand Prix after getting the better of English GM Michael Adams. With this win, the World No. 16 Indian has now maintained his unbeaten run against Adams this year and recorded his second successive victory against him. Harikrishna has accumulated a total of 2.5 points and is placed 13th on the leaderboard.
